price: 49 Ceci est un rappel. A ceux qui craignent leur Seigneur est réservée la plus heureuse retraite,
arabic: هَٰذَا ذِكۡرٞۚ وَإِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: hādhā dhik'run wa-inna lil'muttaqīna laḥus'na maābin
